p: As another example, the antioxidant effect of butanol extracts from wild specimens L. album and L. purpureum L. (red dead nettle) collected in Romania were compared for DPPH and chemiluminescence activity. A possible correlation between the chemical composition, especially for the amount of total phenols, and the antioxidant activity of the extracts was found [ 110]. In both cases, the extracts possessed dose-dependent scavenger activity evaluated after 30 min. Incubation with extracts, in all dose levels tested, whereas, the L. purpureum extract (1% concentration) exhibited the highest scavenging activity compared with L. album extract.
